title: seek3r
author: seek3r

content: FREE Raffle XMAS SPECIAL!HO HO HO!It's been a long time... so I figured it's time for me to host a raffle again! And what time is better than Christmas? ¬†I have thought about what I can take as a prize, which has not necessarily been offered before someone as Raffle and have gone through my private collection and therefore hope that it goes down well with you. But let's not waste time, let's get to the price for this raffle:Infos about the prizeTo win this one is a set of several coins from BitcoinPenny eponymous Bitcoin Pennies. The set consists of the following coins: 1x Bitcoin Penny Dave 2016 1x Bitcoin Penny Irie 2017 1x Bitcoin Penny Julie 2018 There will be only one winner!Terms- Account must be registered prior to 01/06/22- As noted before I'll take the right to exclude special members that acted foolish/childish in the past.- No multis or you or you are going to excluded to this and raffles in the future.- If the prize is lost in the transit, there will be no replacement- Shipping will be included worldwide!- NEW: Minimum of 5 received merits! (if you dont have any trust etc)How can I participate?Just pick a number between 00-99 which is available and you are in! Please post in the following format: "YOUR NUMBER/SPOT - YOUR USERNAME"After every spot is taken, I will choose a block that will be mined in the near future and the last two numbers of the hash will determine the winnerI will contact the winner for further instructions.Available Slots00 - minerjones 01 - synthylover 02- 2stout 03 - Abiky04 - Fundamentals Of05 - 5tift06 - TopTort777 07 - krogothmanhattan08 - Getmon09 - Real-Duke 10 - MoparMiningLLC 11 - sam0012 - worgon12 13 - ¬†geo14 - GazetaBitcoin 15 - PeakDK16 - pangu17 - salad daging18 - Humble Bitcoiner19 - zukiplay20- ChiBitCTy 21 - henkcryptotank 22 - Frank Alpen Coin 23 - hopenotlate24 - pinky123425 - FattCatt26 - MrsMopar27 - Remsjack28 - bct_ail29 - bestcoin_5930 - PeakDK31 - Iced32 - Jambo USA33 - bullrun2020bro34 - Ratimov 35 - Eclipse 36 - BTCOVERFIATS37 - Dernoste ¬†38 - PM-ICT39 - buckrogers 40 - Suzuki Matt41 - BobbyCoins42 - tweetious 43 - cygan 44 - wwzsocki45 - JanEmil46 - The_Crypto_Kid47 - ovcijisir48 - Hotdog749 - Jcga50 - TheNewcomer51 - geosgaen052 - aoluain53 - julerz1254 - digicoinuser55 - YodasRedRocket 56 - Steeley57 - Rizzrack 58 - Timelord206759 - hZti 60 - mx12.levins61 - m2017 62 - CarribaenTreasures63 - LitLitBit 64 - HeRetiK65 - bitbollo66 - slimzak67 - PawGo68 - TBB69 - Hookzup170 - Markzellers 71 - Mbitr72 - Sunny 73 - F2b74 - Willi997475- Darker4576 -Amax16 ¬†77 - QuakerBull ¬†78 - SatsLife79- Crytocanuk 80 - busminer81 - 2stout82 - trankil83 - haloxon 84 - Koal-84 ¬†85 - CoinEraser86 - examplens87 - Kryptowerk88 - Buchi-88 89 - xSlyy90 - tread9391 - Mauser9392 - NeuroticFish 93 - CryptoGreatDane94 - CoinEraser95 - 5tift96 - Asuspawer0997 - doblezero98 - 0Ryu_Ar199 - Mocacinno Good luck to all participants!
